column4: I just upgraded my girlfriend's Dell Inspiron 6000 laptop from Gutsy to Hardy, and now the screen doesn't turn on after resuming from suspend-to-RAM (shutting the lid). Can anyone offer any advice on troubleshooting this?
sounds like a bug; best to file one at launchpad
what information should I file with it?

just as you have typed it here; if the devs need more info they will ask you to post it--but you need to check back on that bug from time to time for their comments and possible workarounds that people post
